thread.title: Trump blasts Roger Goodell: 'He’s a stupid guy'

title: Trump blasts Roger Goodell: 'He’s a stupid guy'
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Trump blasts Roger Goodell: 'He’s a stupid guy' "The commissioner is a dope." Post to Facebook Trump blasts Roger Goodell: 'He’s a stupid guy' "The commissioner is a dope." Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Trump blasts Roger Goodell: 'He’s a stupid guy' Andrew Joseph 6:26 p.m. ET Feb. 1, 2017 
Donald Trump and Roger Goodell (Photo: AFP/USA TODAY Sports Images) 
During his presidential campaign, Donald Trump touted his friendships with the Patriots' Tom Brady, Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft, who obviously don't have a great relationship with NFL commissioner Roger Goodell. 
While Goodell declined to speak about Trump or the controversial travel ban, Trump had no problem with blasting Goodell to The New York Times Magazine . 
In an interview with Mark Leibovich , Trump called Goodell a "dope," bringing up how he handled Ray Rice's domestic violence suspension and the Patriots' "Deflategate." 
He said: 
"The commissioner is a weak guy," Trump said. "When he made the Ray Rice deal, everybody said: You're stupid. You're weak. And it was such a weak deal. So now he's going overboard with their star, Brady." 
He added: "The commissioner is a dope. He's a stupid guy." 
By far the best deal Kraft ever made was hiring Belichick, Trump said. Who, by the way, is also "a great, great friend" of Trump's, even though everyone just assumes he's "a really rough guy."
